title: Girls Or Boys
lyrics:
Why she cut her hair so short?
Do she like girls or boys anymore?

Do she like girls or boys? (Does she like girls or boys?)

Don't you worry about it, just know money ain't short (ain't short)

Don't you worry about who I be kicking it with



Cause' I might pull up with yo man



Then I might dip with your bitch



I'm not really trying to get into no internet shit



They say I love you Toni, but I'm not listening



All these bitches trying to be wifey



But when it comes to me I just one night these



He said damn put down yo wrist girl it's blinding



That's the only reason why these niggas like me



You care too much about who I want



You care too much about who I fuck



But when I fucking

Don't you worry about it, just know money ain't short (girls or boys)

Now they all want a mention, now they all wanna get in (oh)



Gotta let these hoes know



My life is on the go



I don't have time for it



Why you worried about what I do in private?

I can make you feel it, mmm aye



You gone make me feel it good, mmm



Imma make you feel it boy
